name: sgf-meetup-api
description: Running an API Gateway with four Lambdas to do CRUD operations on DynamoDB

scripts.synth: npm run clean && npm run cdk synth
scripts.deploy: cross-env BUILD_ENV=production npm run cdk synth
scripts.dev:api: npm run synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/sgf-meetup-api.template.json --docker-network sgf-meetup-api
scripts.dev:importer: npm run synth && sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/sgf-meetup-api.template.json --docker-network sgf-meetup-api importerFunction
scripts.dev:sync-dynamodb: npm run synth && npm run ts-node scripts/syncDynamodb.ts
